songs.title: Chrono.Naut
songs.lyrics:
(coughing)

[Verse 1]
Psychedelic mind transferral
The toxins flow
Interplanetary travel
Reality's too slow
Our flying saucer acemate with a cosmic joo

[Verse 2]
Step up on our magic caravan
This planet's doomed
Yeah

[Chorus]
Travelling through space and time
Chrononaut

[Verse 3]
The wizard gave us the key yeah
Placed it in our veins
A spaceship powered by sorcery
We'll never be the same
Jetting through the multiverse to find a new sun
Chrononaut through time and space
Our minds will be as one
Yeah

[Chorus]

[Verse 4]
We'll travel to the end of time
To the final chapter of mankind
We'll be at one with the stars
And peace and love will at last be ours
Yeah

[Verse 4]

Sabbath

[Verse 5]
We're the chrononauts
Traveling through time
We'll ride the time streams baby
And witness a billion suns

[Verse 6]
Let's stand upon the shores
Of the chaos sea
Where dreams become reality
Yeah
Where dreams become reality

[Outro]
Yeah
We're gonna take you through time
We're the chrononauts
Traveling through time
Witness billion suns
Far reach
We're gonna blow your mind
Cosmic
Cosmic
Blow your mind
Blow your mind
Touch it
Smoke it
*inhale*
*exhale*
Cosmic child
Travelling through time
Space and time
Yeah
I'll see you on the other side

Rise to the stars
To the stars
To the stars
Prepare for mind transferral

Smoke it
Smoke it
Smoke it
Smoke it
